message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this incredible product that's worth a lot to me. I'm confident it will be valuable for you too. I'm asking for $1500000 for it. Let me know your thoughts!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1400000 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I need to stay closer to my initial asking price.  Let's meet in the middle at $1450000. It's a fair price for the value this product will bring you.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm glad we're getting closer. I would like to propose a price of $1425000 for the product. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget. I hope this works for you!
